reviewText: If this is the same ranger bill I listened to 18+ yrs ago, we need these! In this day kids need uplifting clean stories and new hero's to follow. I still remember many of them and loved Ranger Bill, Stumpy, and I think I had a crush on his nephew Chad!!! There was the time Chad and a friend climbed into a huge empty  water tank and the ladder fell down, stranding them inside, and then someone started to fill the tank! Then there was the one when a boy got caught in a bear trap. Lots of good memories!
